animeDescription: The anime follows a salaryman who has a chance meeting with a girl named Ai on the train. They begin to meet every Monday on the train, with the man serving as her bodyguard on the crowded commute while they chat.(Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: Getsuyoubi no Tawawa', 'Side story: Getsuyoubi no Tawawa Specials', 'Sequel: Getsuyoubi no Tawawa 2']
